translations: v．漫步，闲逛：以轻松、悠闲的步伐行走。

sentences.sentence: We ambled down to the beach.
Slowly they ambled back to the car.
sentences.translation: 他们缓步回到汽车那儿。

sentences.sentence: Armed only with a dog-eared NEWSWEEK ID, I ambled through the gates of the National Assembly last week.
sentences.translation: 上周，我带着一张折了角的《新闻周刊》ID（NEWSWEEK ID），悠闲地走进了国民大会（National Assembly）的大门。
